categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: A conflict erupted between the Jedi and the Zygerrian Slave Empire as part of a larger Outer Rim anti-slavery campaign waged by the Galactic Republic after the Zygerrians did not comply to cease their slaving operations. The Jedi crushed the Zygerrians.
The Zygerrian slaver Darts D'Nar felt great resentment towards the Jedi for this act and took out his frustration on Obi-Wan Kenobi in a duel during the Clone Wars.
